content:
RetryPolicy.DefaultFixed Property

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling
Assembly:
Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling.dll

In this Article

Returns a default policy that implements a fixed retry interval configured with the default FixedInterval retry strategy. The default retry policy treats all caught exceptions as transient errors.

public static Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling.RetryPolicy DefaultFixed { get; }
Returns
RetryPolicy

To be added.
